seq_along() Starting at 0

Source: R/query.R
query-helpers.Rd

seq_along() Starting at 0

Process Query Parameters

Evaluate Query Parameters

Format Public API Queries

Format Provider API Queries

Query Formatting Helpers

Usage

seq_along0(x)

process_params(arg_names, field_names)

eval_params(args, fields)

format_query_public(args, operator = "=")

format_query_provider(args, operator = "=")

greater_than(x, equals = FALSE)

less_than(x, equals = FALSE)

starts_with(x)

ends_with(x)

contains(x)

between(x, negate = FALSE)

is_in(x, negate = FALSE)

Arguments

x

<chr> input

arg_names

<chr> vector of argument names

field_names

<chr> vector of API field names

args

named <list> or vector of <chr> arguments

fields

<chr> vector of API field names

operator

<chr> logical operator; acceptable options are: =, >=, <=, >, <, <>, STARTS_WITH, ENDS_WITH, CONTAINS, IN, NOT IN, BETWEEN, NOT BETWEEN, IS NULL, IS NOT NULL

equals

<lgl> append "="; default is FALSE

negate

<lgl> prepend "NOT"; default is FALSE

Value

<expr> of processed query parameters

<list> of evaluated query parameters

<list> of formatted query <exprs>

<list> of formatted query <exprs>

 `<list>` of query parameters

Examples

format_query_public(list("NPI" = "1417918293", "PECOS" = NULL))
#>     filter[1][path] filter[1][operator]    filter[1][value] 
#>               "NPI"                 "="        "1417918293" 

format_query_public(list(NPI = "1417918293", PECOS = "001132"))
#>     filter[1][path] filter[1][operator]    filter[1][value]     filter[2][path] 
#>               "NPI"                 "="        "1417918293"             "PECOS" 
#> filter[2][operator]    filter[2][value] 
#>                 "="            "001132" 

format_query_provider(list("NPI" = "1417918293", "PECOS" = NULL))
#> conditions[0][property] conditions[0][operator]    conditions[0][value] 
#>                   "NPI"                     "="            "1417918293" 

format_query_provider(list(NPI = "1417918293", PECOS = "001132"))
#> conditions[0][property] conditions[0][operator]    conditions[0][value] 
#>                   "NPI"                     "="            "1417918293" 
#> conditions[1][property] conditions[1][operator]    conditions[1][value] 
#>                 "PECOS"                     "="                "001132" 

if (FALSE) { # rlang::is_interactive()
greater_than(1)
starts_with("foo")
is_in(state.abb[10:15])
}
